message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price! It's a one-time opportunity to get it for $10,000.
I appreciate the offer, but $10,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. What do you think?
I understand you're looking for a better price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,000. I can do $10,500, which is a compromise between our previous offers.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $10,500 is still a bit too high. I'm willing to go up to $9,500. Let's find a compromise to make this deal work.
I'm willing to meet you at $10,000, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. I can do $10,250, and that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $10,250 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9,875.  Let's find a solution that works for both of us.

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle. I'm willing to make one more significant concession. I can do $10,000, but I need to get at least $10,500 out of this deal. I'm willing to meet you at $10,000, but that's as low as I can go.
